Articles.Content:
Hello, I would like to request a mod that can manage Application Launcher button visibility. Currently, some mods use the button to show only configuration of that mod, which is good, but after that the button becomes useless and clutters the Application Launcher.

As an example, I could hide 6 buttons here which leaves me more room for other buttons:

Some of the requirements that the manager should have:

  • User must be able hide specific buttons on the Application Launcher, even stock buttons;
  • And it must be possible to do this for different scenes;
  • Once a button is hidden, it must be possible to make it visible again.

Get Toolbar. Lots of mods uses it in place of stock app bars, and stock one is kind of problematic to work with anyway. While it would not do what you are asking - modifying the stock app bar, it would help migrate a lot of mods on that list.
